answers.answer: Your blood pressure may be high which could be an early sign of preeclampsia.  Try to limit your activity.  Laying on your left side to naturally reduce blood pressure.  Also limit your salt intake and increase your water consumption. Make sure you let your doctor know as well.
Thnxx for reply ... my bp is normal.. 120/80 ....
Thnxx for reply ... my bp is normal.. 120/80 ....
Good to hear that. I suppose it could simply be hormones

Even though your blood pressure is normal when women are pregnant their blood levels almost double. It's extra blood that is causing the flushing and hot feelings. Pluss hormones will cause you to feel overheated. My blood pressure is always low but I am always hot and flushed.

question: Hi everyone ... I'm having a flushing face ... i really feel hot n feverish on my face ... does anybody else feeling the same ?? Im 3 months pregnant MASHALLAH ... plz help me to reduce it ... thanx ... !!!
